description: Evolution of the Trekker Lite II model, its shape is inspired by the Tengu Lite model. Ideal for day excursions of medium difficulty on varied terrain. High level of comfort and stability. The lasting board and sole unit features the exclusive AKU Elica Natural Stride System technology to enhance the bio-dynamic performance.
name: Aku Trekker Pro GTX - Mens

specs.value: 6.4mm Nylon & Die Cut EVA for Rock Protection & Stability
Leather Suede & Air8000 with Welded PU Film
Keep your feet dry with the integrated waterproof GORE-TEX Performance Comfort membrane with added breathability
The VIBRAM Curcuma mountain sole is designed to carry you through any terrain. From rugged trails to steep snow and ice, it is there for you
ELICA Technology ensures an anatomical fit to provide better stability and weight distribution across your boot sole to reduce pressure points and encourage better hiking form
